appartements.title: Modern apartments/holiday homes directly at the ski area
appartements.description: Modern apartments / holiday apartments directly at the Sillian Thurntaler ski area for your perfect holiday in East Tyrol; 2-6 people; very child-friendly, large garden, 32m² - 85m²; high quality equipment; Breakfast buffet in the house, cafe with perfect cappucino on the ground floor.

bookApartment.title: Book your holiday apartment at the Brückenwirt
bookApartment.description: Book your holiday apartment directly without agency fees
bookApartment.h1: Book your apartment with the best price guarantee!
bookApartment.headline: Secure, fast, most cost-effective booking, no intermediary fees

bookingConditions.priceApartmentText1: The apartment prices are per apartment and day.
bookingConditions.priceApartmentText4: Please refer to the descriptions of the apartments for details.
bookingConditions.h2Text1: It is possible to book specific room categories. We reserve the right to request specific room numbers and floors. Of course, we try to fulfill your wishes as much as possible.
bookingConditions.h3Text1: Bed linen and towels, change after 7 days, additional pillows/blankets possible (please ask in the café)
bookingConditions.h3Text3: Fully equipped kitchen (oven, dishwasher, fridge with freezer compartment, coffee machine, kettle and sufficient kitchen utensils,...)
bookingConditions.h3Text4: Each apartment has one or more balconies
bookingConditions.h4Text1: We keep your apartment guaranteed until 7.00 pm. Please contact us for a later arrival.
bookingConditions.h5Text1: We want to clean your room thoroughly before you move in. Therefore, it is only ready for occupancy from 13:00.
bookingConditions.h5Text2: On the day of departure, the room is available until 10:00 am.
bookingConditions.h6Text1: We accept Mastercard, Visa, American Express, debit card or cash.
bookingConditions.h7Text1: For a binding reservation, we ask you for a deposit of 20% of the total amount. The deposit must be paid within 10 days of receipt of the written reservation confirmation. Bank details: Osttiroler Volksbank; IBAN:AT584073000030002885, BIC OVLIAT21XXX. The full amount is due upon arrival. Payment methods:
bookingConditions.h7Text2: Bank transfer/cash in advance, ATM, Mastercard, Visa, cash on site
bookingConditions.h8Text1: ... Something can always come up! We recommend that you take out travel cancellation insurance. For example, you can take out one with the European Travel Insurance. Cancellations are only valid in writing. Up to 30 days before the start of the holiday can be cancelled free of charge. From 30 days to 7 days before arrival we charge 80% of the total amount. From 7 days before arrival, no-show, late arrival/early departure we charge 100% of the total amount. The Austrian Hotel Contract Terms and Conditions apply. Place of fulfilment Sillian, place of jurisdiction Lienz in East Tyrol.
bookingConditions.h9Text1: The visitor's tax is levied all year round by the municipality of Heinfels and currently amounts to €2 per person/night.
bookingConditions.h9Text2: Children and teenagers up to the age of 15 are free.
bookingConditions.h10Text1: Our prices are inclusive and include the tax rate on overnight services.
bookingConditions.h11Text1: When a new price list is published, an existing price list loses its validity. The statutory VAT rate applies. Price differences in the individual price categories are only due to the size, equipment and location of the rooms or the booking of packages. All other services are the same.

cafe.quote: <q>The most beautiful sun terrace in the Pustertal</q>
cafe.text2: Sun terrace open all year round
cafe.knownFor: We are known for our perfect cappuccino, homemade cakes and tarts, iced coffee and sundaes, organic fruit juices and our beautiful sun terrace. Our ice cream comes from a small organic ice cream factory in the Villgratental. We also offer breakfast and have a small menu with local products. We are looking forward to your visit!

contact.headline: We look forward to your visit and your message

historyDEPRECATED.altImage1: Historical picture of the Brückenwirt farm
historyDEPRECATED.altImage2: Flood water runs through the Brückenwirt house
historyDEPRECATED.beginning: The Brückenwirt in Heinfels near Sillian has been family-owned for over 150 years. The history of the “Brückenwirt” goes back to 1868.
historyDEPRECATED.beginning2: Since 1969, the then “Oberthaler” inn has been called “Brückenwirt”, which refers to the neighboring wooden bridge (Punbrugge).
historyDEPRECATED.beginning3: Originally, in addition to the restaurant, this traditional house also had its own butcher's shop and a small farm. The inn at the entrance to the Villgratental was an important place to stop and stay overnight for carters and merchants traveling to Lienz and Italy.
historyDEPRECATED.highWater: In 1963 Gertrud (born Oberthaler) and Heribert Pichler took over the property.
historyDEPRECATED.highWater2: Now getting on in years, they renovated the old walls with a lot of love and zeal. However, shortly before completion, the old inn was severely affected by a flood disaster in 1966. Due to the heavy rains around August 17th, the Villgraterbach found a new stream bed and flowed through the basement of the building.
historyDEPRECATED.highWater3: After unsuccessful renovation measures on the old farm, today's Brückenwirt was built between 1967 and 1969. Gertrud and Heribert Pichler have created a tradition-conscious company with a lot of hard work and love. With the handover from the parent generation to the next generation, the bridge host further develops and adapts to the needs of the present.
historyDEPRECATED.revitalisation: In 2014 the Brückenwirt was completely renovated, revitalized and reopened in autumn 2014. The rooms have been converted into high-quality apartments. Each holiday apartment has access to at least one balcony with a clear view to the east towards Lienz, to the south to the Carnic Alps or to the west. Each apartment has its own personal touch.

home.altAppartment: Bedroom of a holiday apartment with a double bed
home.appartmentText: Enjoy your holiday in our modern holiday apartments directly at the Thurntaler Sillian ski area. The Three Peaks, the Lienz Dolomites and the Villgrat Mountains form the impressive backdrop for your activities in all seasons.
home.headline: holidays in the mountains
home.cafeText: Enjoy the time in our cozy cafe
home.aktivitaetenText: Discover the diversity of the region
home.greetingText2: Welcome to our cozy apartment house! Discover our unique apartments and enjoy the relaxed atmosphere in our café.
home.greetingText3: With us you will not only find a temporary home, but also a bit of warmth and hospitality.
home.cafeIntro: Café Brückenwirt is a cozy café with a beautiful sun terrace in the Pustertal. Here you can enjoy a perfect cappuccino made from the famous Brückenwirt blend. The café also offers homemade tarts and cakes, sundaes and ice cream from the organic mountain farm in the Villgratental as well as organic fruit juices. The large garden with children's playground is another highlight of the café. The café is very conveniently located and offers a warm and personal atmosphere all year round.
home.herotext: Modern holiday apartments directly at the ski area
home.heroimagealt: Brückenwirt with butterfly in the foreground
home.metaDescription: Beautifully located apartment house with modern apartments / holiday apartments directly at the Sillian / Thurntaler ski area for your perfect holiday in East Tyrol; very child-friendly, large garden, high-quality furnishings, breakfast buffet in the house, cafe with a perfect cappucino on the ground floor.
home.metaTitle: Modern holiday apartments directly at the ski area in East Tyrol

studio.title: Apartment Studio
studio.text1: Our smallest holiday apartment on the 1st floor, ideal for 2 people.
studio.text2: The pull-out couch can accommodate 3 people.
studio.text3: The holiday apartment offers a clear view to the west on its generous balcony.
studio.text4: Large windows bring lots of natural light into the bright rooms.
studio.text5: Living-bedroom with double bed and pull-out sofa bed
studio.text6: Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, electric stove with oven, refrigerator with freezer compartment, dishes and extensive kitchen utensils
studio.text8: Own spacious, sunny balcony (real wood floor) with approx. 9 m², table and chairs on the balcony
studio.text10: Bathroom with shower, toilet, hairdryer, towel dryer
studio.text11: Bed linen and enough towels included
studio.text12: Washing machine, drying room, ski boot dryer, mountain bike repair option in the basement
studio.text14: Use of garden, barbecue area, playground
studio.text15: Breakfast option in the cafe (please book in advance)
